DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study Safety Efficacy MPSK3169A Patients With Coronary Heart Disease High Risk Coronary Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: Use standardofcare statin stable dose , intolerance statin , without use lipid modifying therapy Fasting LDL cholesterol 90250 mg/dL statin regimen And least one following : Coronary heart disease ( CHD ) history myocardial infarction ( MI ) , percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , coronary artery bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) , prior coronary angiography demonstrate coronary atherosclerosis A CHD risk equivalent condition , include diabetes mellitus ( type 1 2 ) , chronic kidney disease , prior stroke , carotid disease , peripheral arterial disease , abdominal aortic aneurism > /=2 CHD risk factor ( age > /= 45 year men > /= 55 year woman ; smoke ; hypertension ; low HDL cholesterol ; family history premature CHD ) high risk CV event base risk estimation system Severe congestive heart failure ( NYHA Class IIIIV ) leave ventricular ejection fraction < /= 35 % Recent ( within 3 month ) MI , unstable angina , stroke , transient ischemic attack , CABG , PCI , hospital admission heart failure , major surgery , uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia ( atrial fibrillation flutter ) , initiation renal replacement therapy ( dialysis ) Fasting serum triglyceride level > /= 400 mg/dL Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Poorly control diabetes mellitus , hypertension thyroid disease Liver muscle disease , include abnormal test result screen Pregnant lactate The list intend contain factor relevant patient 's eligibility study .
